verse: तदैक्षत बहु स्यां प्रजायेयेति तत्तेजोऽसृजत तत्तेज ऐक्षत बहु स्यां प्रजायेयेति तदपोऽसृजत॥ तस्माद्यत्र क्व च शोचति स्वेदते वा पुरुषस्तेजस एव तदध्यापो जायन्ते॥
meaning: Meaning:That (Brahman) saw, "May I become many and be born." That (Brahman) created radiance. That (Brahman) saw, "May I become many and be born." That (Brahman) created water. Therefore, wherever it dries up or perspires, semen (tejas) is produced and beings are born.
